title: Kickstarter Tater Salad Fund Is No Small Potatoes
teaser: Within days of asking for a total of $10 to crowdsource his first potato salad, Ohioan Zack Brown raised tens of thousands of dollars. Apparently he'll be making a lot of potato salad.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
